game.title: AETHUS
game.description: AETHUS is a story-driven survival game with a low-poly isometric style and deep, systemic gameplay. Explore a futuristic underground world to mine and prospect for the valuable resources you need to build up your mining outpost, while unraveling a dystopian corporate conspiracy.
game.history: After leaving the AAA games industry, Alex's first project of his own always had to be a sci-fi survival game. Inspired both by classics like Lego Rock Raiders and modern survival gems like Subnautica, AETHUS is a love letter to story-driven singleplayer exploration, built around compelling physics-based gathering and base-building features.

features.feature: Stylised low-poly, high-fidelity graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.
Mine and prospect for resources in a compelling, physics-based, futuristic sci-fi world.
Build up a mining outpost - construct buildings and facilities, acquire new plans and decorate with extensive cosmetic options.
Deep, story-driven exploration - follow in the boot-prints of a previous expedition and navigate a world of dystopian ultra-capitalism.
Riveting narrative and world-building driven by themes of corporate greed and the hope of a fresh start.
Mine, collect, prospect, refine and craft a huge amount of resources, items and tools.
Upgrade your tools and mining suit to unlock new abilities and improve your efficiency.
Fully voice-acted and featuring an original 'space-celtic' soundtrack.
